ColumnHeaderAliases.Alias: Fläche des Flurstücks in der Karte

WorkSheet.Sql:
SELECT a.ID, a.FSK, a.FLSTALB,
a.GKZ_KRS, rel_kreis.bez as GKZ_KRS_text,
a.GKZ_GEM, rel_gemeinde.bez as GEMEINDENAME,
a.GMK_GMN, rel_gemarkung.bez as GEMARKUNGSNAME,
a.FLN, a.FSN_ZAE, a.FSN_NEN,
a.AFL as AMTLICHEFLAECHE, st_area(ax.geometrie) as area,
( SELECT round(sum(ST_Area(ST_Intersection(a.shape, b.shape))::numeric), 3) FROM sg_flurstueck_f a, sg_gebaeude_f b WHERE a.objectid = ax.gid AND ST_Intersects(a.shape, b.shape) = TRUE ) as area_bebaute_flaeche FROM alkisgeometrie_f ax INNER JOIN ax_flurstueck a ON a.id_hash = ax.id_hash LEFT JOIN ax_kreisregion rel_kreis ON rel_kreis.sll_lan = a.gkz_lan AND rel_kreis.sll_rbz = a.gkz_rbz AND rel_kreis.sll_krs = a.gkz_krs AND rel_kreis.endet IS NULL LEFT JOIN ax_gemeinde rel_gemeinde ON rel_gemeinde.gkz_lan = a.gkz_lan AND rel_gemeinde.gkz_rbz = a.gkz_rbz AND rel_gemeinde.gkz_krs = a.gkz_krs AND rel_gemeinde.gkz_gem = a.gkz_gem AND rel_gemeinde.endet IS NULL LEFT JOIN ax_gemarkung rel_gemarkung ON rel_gemarkung.gmk_lan = a.gmk_lan AND rel_gemarkung.gmk_gmn = a.gmk_gmn AND rel_gemarkung.endet IS NULL WHERE a.ENDET IS NULL AND ax.gid = {0}

SELECT distinct(bblatt.id), a.fsk,
-- ax_buchungsstelle: --c.name AS bs_bart, c.anzeigetext AS bs_bart_text, mebs.ant_zae AS bs_miteig_ant_zae, mebs.ant_nen AS bs_miteig_ant_nen,
-- ax_namensnummer: nnummer.lnr AS nnummer_lnr, --nnummer.art AS nnummer_eigentuemerart, nnummer.ant_zae AS nnummer_ant_zae, nnummer.ant_nen AS nnummer_ant_nen, r_eigentuemerart.anzeigetext AS nnummer_eigentuemerart_text,
-- ax_buchungsblatt: bblatt.bbk AS bblatt_kennz, bblatt.bbz_bbb AS bblatt_bezirk, ax_buchungsblattbezirk.bez AS bblatt_bezirk_text, bblatt.bbn AS bblatt_nummer, --bblatt.blt AS bblatt_bart, r_bblattart.anzeigetext AS bblarr_bart_text,
-- ax_person: --person.id_hash AS id_hash_person, r_anrede.anzeigetext AS person_anrede_text, person.akd AS person_akad_grad, person.nof AS person_name, person.vna AS person_vorname, --person.anr AS person_anrede, --concat(r_anrede.name, "/", r_anrede.anzeigetext) AS person_anrede_text, person.geb AS person_geburtsdatum, person.gna AS person_geburtsname FROM alkisgeometrie_f ax INNER JOIN ax_flurstueck a ON a.id_hash = ax.id_hash INNER JOIN v_sg_me_fs_bs mebs ON mebs.id_hash_fs = a.id_hash AND mebs.endet IS NULL LEFT JOIN codelist c ON c.name = mebs.bar AND c.art = 'AX_Buchungsart_Buchungsstelle' INNER JOIN ax_buchungsblatt bblatt ON bblatt.id_hash = mebs.best_von_hash AND bblatt.endet IS NULL AND bblatt.blt != 5000 LEFT JOIN ax_namensnummer nnummer ON nnummer.bst_von_hash = bblatt.id_hash AND nnummer.endet IS NULL LEFT JOIN ax_person person ON person.id_hash = nnummer.benennt_hash AND person.endet IS NULL LEFT JOIN ax_buchungsblattbezirk ON ax_buchungsblattbezirk.sll_bbb = bblatt.bbz_bbb AND ax_buchungsblattbezirk.zst_lan = bblatt.bbz_lan AND ax_buchungsblattbezirk.endet IS NULL LEFT JOIN CODELIST r_bblattart ON r_bblattart.name = CAST(bblatt.blt AS VARCHAR) AND r_bblattart.ART = 'AX_Blattart_Buchungsblatt' LEFT JOIN CODELIST r_eigentuemerart ON r_eigentuemerart.NAME = CAST(nnummer.art AS VARCHAR) AND r_eigentuemerart.ART = 'AX_Eigentuemerart_Namensnummer' LEFT JOIN CODELIST r_anrede ON r_anrede.NAME = CAST(person.anr AS VARCHAR) AND r_anrede.ART = 'AX_Anrede_Person' WHERE a.ENDET IS NULL AND ax.gid = {0}

SELECT distinct(bblatt.id), a.fsk,
-- ax_buchungsstelle: --c.name AS bs_bart, c.anzeigetext AS bs_bart_text, mebs.ant_zae AS bs_miteig_ant_zae, mebs.ant_nen AS bs_miteig_ant_nen,
-- ax_namensnummer: nnummer.lnr AS nnummer_lnr, --nnummer.art AS nnummer_eigentuemerart, nnummer.ant_zae AS nnummer_ant_zae, nnummer.ant_nen AS nnummer_ant_nen, r_eigentuemerart.anzeigetext AS nnummer_eigentuemerart_text,
-- ax_buchungsblatt: bblatt.bbk AS bblatt_kennz, bblatt.bbz_bbb AS bblatt_bezirk, bblatt.bbn AS bblatt_nummer, ax_buchungsblattbezirk.bez AS bblatt_bezirk_text, --bblatt.blt AS bblatt_bart, r_bblattart.anzeigetext AS bblarr_bart_text,
-- ax_person: --person.id_hash AS id_hash_person, person.nof AS person_name, person.vna AS person_vorname, --person.anr AS person_anrede, --concat(r_anrede.name, "/", r_anrede.anzeigetext) AS person_anrede_text, r_anrede.anzeigetext AS person_anrede_text, person.akd AS person_akad_grad, person.geb AS person_geburtsdatum, person.gna AS person_geburtsname,
anschrift.plz AS plz, anschrift.orp AS wohnort, anschrift.ott AS ortsteil, concat( anschrift.orp, (CASE WHEN anschrift.ott IS NULL THEN '' ELSE concat(' (', anschrift.ott, ')') END) ) AS ort_ortsteil, anschrift.str AS strasse, anschrift.hsn AS hnr, anschrift.hsnr_z AS hnr_zusatz, concat(anschrift.hsn, (CASE WHEN anschrift.hsnr_z IS NULL THEN '' ELSE ' ' END), anschrift.hsnr_z) AS hnr_mit_zusatz, r_qualitaet.pro_name, r_qualitaet.des_anschrift, concat(r_qualitaet.pro_name, ' / ', r_qualitaet.des_anschrift) AS qualitaet_text
FROM alkisgeometrie_f ax INNER JOIN ax_flurstueck a ON a.id_hash = ax.id_hash INNER JOIN v_sg_me_fs_bs mebs ON mebs.id_hash_fs = a.id_hash AND mebs.endet IS NULL LEFT JOIN codelist c ON c.name = mebs.bar AND c.art = 'AX_Buchungsart_Buchungsstelle' INNER JOIN ax_buchungsblatt bblatt ON bblatt.id_hash = mebs.best_von_hash AND bblatt.endet IS NULL AND bblatt.blt != 5000 LEFT JOIN ax_namensnummer nnummer ON nnummer.bst_von_hash = bblatt.id_hash AND nnummer.endet IS NULL LEFT JOIN ax_person person ON person.id_hash = nnummer.benennt_hash AND person.endet IS NULL LEFT JOIN ax_buchungsblattbezirk ON ax_buchungsblattbezirk.sll_bbb = bblatt.bbz_bbb AND ax_buchungsblattbezirk.zst_lan = bblatt.bbz_lan AND ax_buchungsblattbezirk.endet IS NULL LEFT JOIN CODELIST r_bblattart ON r_bblattart.name = CAST(bblatt.blt AS VARCHAR) AND r_bblattart.ART = 'AX_Blattart_Buchungsblatt' LEFT JOIN CODELIST r_eigentuemerart ON r_eigentuemerart.NAME = CAST(nnummer.art AS VARCHAR) AND r_eigentuemerart.ART = 'AX_Eigentuemerart_Namensnummer' LEFT JOIN CODELIST r_anrede ON r_anrede.NAME = CAST(person.anr AS VARCHAR) AND r_anrede.ART = 'AX_Anrede_Person'
LEFT JOIN r_hat r_hat ON r_hat.id_hash = person.id_hash AND r_hat.endet IS NULL LEFT JOIN ax_anschrift anschrift ON anschrift.id_hash = r_hat.rel_hash AND anschrift.endet IS NULL LEFT JOIN r_qualitaetsangaben r_qualitaet ON r_qualitaet.id_hash = anschrift.id_hash AND r_qualitaet.endet is null WHERE a.ENDET IS NULL AND ax.gid = {0}

SELECT tg_objektart.name AS objektart_name, alkisgeometrie_f.fkt_val, nutzung.sfl, round( CAST((100*nutzung.sfl/nutzung.afl) as numeric), 0) as anteil FROM alkisgeometrie_f ax INNER JOIN ax_flurstueck a ON a.id_hash = ax.id_hash
LEFT JOIN tg_nutzung nutzung ON nutzung.fsk = a.fsk AND nutzung.endet IS NULL AND nutzung.sfl > 0.1 LEFT JOIN tg_objektarten tg_objektart ON tg_objektart.objektart = nutzung.art_tn INNER JOIN alkisgeometrie_f ON alkisgeometrie_f.id_hash = nutzung.id_tn_hash AND alkisgeometrie_f.endet is null WHERE a.ENDET IS NULL AND ax.gid = {0}

SELECT a.fsk, me_lage.kreis_region, me_lage.gemeinde, me_lage.strasse, me_lage.hausnummer, me_lage.strasse || CASE WHEN me_lage.hausnummer IS NULL THEN '' ELSE ' ' || me_lage.hausnummer END str_mit_hnr FROM alkisgeometrie_f ax INNER JOIN ax_flurstueck a ON a.id_hash = ax.id_hash INNER JOIN v_sg_me_fs_lagebezeichnung me_lage ON me_lage.id_hash_fs = a.id_hash WHERE a.ENDET IS NULL AND ax.gid = {0} ORDER BY me_lage.kreis_region, me_lage.gemeinde, me_lage.strasse, me_lage.hausnummer
